meanings.definition: Having a stale, moldy, or damp smell.
meanings.sent1: The old books in the library had a musty odor.
meanings.sent2: The basement had a musty smell after the rain.
meanings.sent3: The musty smell in the attic made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house had a musty scent that clung to your clothes.
meanings.sent5: The musty aroma of the antique shop was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Outdated or old-fashioned in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her musty dress looked like it came from another era.
meanings.sent2: The musty furniture in the room gave it a vintage feel.
meanings.sent3: He wore a musty hat to the party as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The musty curtains reminded her of her grandmother's house.
meanings.sent5: The musty design of the wallpaper was a blast from the past.
